name: Diapers
description: Client's father had a recent relapse of cancer and will be starting on chemo therapy next year. He was diagnosed with colon cancer in 2018 and underwent an operation to remove part of the colon that remove the cancerous cells. As such, he will need to be on diapers to manage his toileting. Client is working as a part-time porter at a hospital, having to manage the caregiving of her elderly parents (Aged 76 and 78). Because of client's low education background, she is stuck in lower waged work. As she is the main caregiver for her parents, she neeeds to engage in part-time employment in order to ensure parents are still being cared for. Her mother is also elderly in age and is weaker in her joints and limbs, unable to move around without assistance/walking frame. Client has applied for comcare assistance for financial support. While waiting for the approval, diapers for client's father will help to defray some household expenses while client continues to manage work alongside her caregiving duties.
specifications: 16 packs - Adult Diapers Tena L & M sized, Pants

contact.org: Touch Community Services - Touch Family Enablement
contact.name: Neo Xiao Hui

passiton.name: Mamy Poko Tape Diapers XXL
passiton.description: Diapers are unopened and bought in 2023.

name: Diapers
description:
Client (F/18) is a single mother with her newborn baby (M/3m). She is taking on her role as a single mother with her partner who is in prison, and is left to be independent in the caregiving role and providing for her baby. With limited support from her family, client is currently looking at taking on 2 part-time jobs and to resume her studies towards the end of the year after her baby stablised and is able to be placed in the infantcare/playgroup. Thus, we hope to seek kind donations to help support her journey on being a young and single mother please. Thank you! 

Requesting for:
Mamypoko Diapers S size tape type

name: Oven
description: Client is a mother of 5, children aged 1, 4,8,10, and 14. Together with her husband, the family stays in a 2-room rental flat. Husband used to be the sole income earner, with client taking charge of the household chores and caregiving of children. However, he suffered a stroke towards the end of last year and had to stop work. Client has since started her own home baking business, whilst managing the multiple caregiving responsibilities at home, which includes both caring for children and husband. Client's oven broke down recently and she hopes to acquire a new oven to help keep her business running to supplement the household income. Oven will go straight to client to help her generate income to meet the basic needs at home.

contact.org: Touch Community Services - Touch Family Enablement
contact.name: Neo Xiao Hui

passiton.name: Like new oven + hood and cooker
passiton.description:
Oven: 60cm length x 54cm depth x 58cm height
- condition: 10/10 never used. no defects as far as I can see.

Hood: 90cm length x 49cm depth x 14cm height (tcm for hood function)
- condition: 9/10 need to change steel filter for hygiene purposes. minimal scratches, buttons are all functional . 

Cooker: 77cm length x 51cm depth x 2cm height
- condition: 8/10 in need of a good clean but no food stuck/no cracks at all 

Vwo pls arrange courier as I'm tight with finances too.
